Class FeedMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • FeedMessage

  • public class FeedMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single messages in a RSS feed A RSS feed may contain multiple feed messages
    Author:
    Shiqing

        Returns:

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(FeedMessage fm,
                     java.lang.String keyWord)
        compare the TFIDF score of a keyword in this FeedMessage with that of the same keyword in another FeedMessage
        Parameters:
        fm -
        keyWord -
        Returns:
        -1 if message is smaller than fm; 0 if they are of the same rank; 1 otherwise.
